EmergencyTimelockController","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"unpauseSystem","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"successFlag","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"inputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"funcSelector","type":"bytes4"},{"internalType":"uint8","name":"thresholdVal","type":"uint8"}],"name":"updateFunctionRestriction","outputs":[{"internalType":"bool","name":"successFlag","type":"bool"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"author":"Rewa","details":"This contract orchestrates responses to security threats across multiple integrated contracts. It defines several emergency levels, can globally pause the system, and enables emergency withdrawals. Critical actions, like escalating to the highest emergency level, require a multi-approval and timelock process. This contract is upgradeable.","errors":{"AmountIsZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when a required amount is zero where it should not be."}],"EC_AccessControlZero()":[{"details":"Thrown if the AccessControl address is zero during initialization."}],"EC_AlreadyAtLevel3()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to approve a Level 3 emergency when the system is already at that level."}],"EC_AlreadyProcessed(address,uint8)":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to re-process an emergency notification for a contract that has already processed it recently.","params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract.","level":"The emergency level."}}],"EC_CannotUnpauseAtLevel3()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to unpause the system while it is at a critical emergency level."}],"EC_ContractAddressZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when providing a zero address for a contract parameter."}],"EC_ContractNotRegistered(address)":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to interact with a contract that is not registered as emergency-aware.","params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the unregistered contract."}}],"EC_EmergencyShutdownCallFailed()":[{"details":"Thrown when a call to an emergency-aware contract's `emergencyShutdown` function fails."}],"EC_InsufficientBalanceToRecover()":[{"details":"Thrown when the contract has an insufficient balance of a token to be recovered."}],"EC_InvalidEmergencyLevel(uint8)":[{"details":"Thrown when setting an invalid emergency level (e.g., > 3).","params":{"level":"The invalid level provided."}}],"EC_Level3TimelockNotExpired()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to execute a Level 3 emergency before its timelock has expired."}],"EC_LevelNotInEmergency(uint8)":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to process a notification for a level that is not currently active.","params":{"level":"The requested, non-active emergency level."}}],"EC_LimitIsZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when a pagination query is made with a limit of zero."}],"EC_MustHaveAdminRole()":[{"details":"Thrown when a caller lacks the DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE."}],"EC_MustHaveEmergencyRole()":[{"details":"Thrown when a caller lacks the EMERGENCY_ROLE."}],"EC_MustHavePauserRole()":[{"details":"Thrown when a caller lacks the PAUSER_ROLE."}],"EC_NoLevel3EscalationInProgress()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to cancel a Level 3 escalation when none is in progress."}],"EC_PenaltyTooHigh(uint256)":[{"details":"Thrown when a penalty value exceeds the maximum allowed.","params":{"penalty":"The invalid penalty provided."}}],"EC_RecoveryAdminNotSet()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to recover tokens but the recovery admin address is not set."}],"EC_RequiredApprovalsTooHigh(uint256,uint256)":[{"details":"Thrown when setting the required approvals to a value that is too high.","params":{"maxAllowed":"The maximum allowed zero."}],"EC_SystemAlreadyPaused()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to pause a system that is already paused."}],"EC_SystemNotPaused()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to unpause a system that is not paused."}],"EC_ThresholdInvalid(uint8)":[{"details":"Thrown when setting a function restriction threshold to an invalid value.","params":{"threshold":"The invalid threshold provided."}}],"EC_TimelockTooLong()":[{"details":"Thrown if the Level 3 timelock duration is set to a value that is too long."}],"EC_TimelockTooShort()":[{"details":"Thrown if the Level 3 timelock duration is set to a value that is too short."}],"EC_UseApproveForLevel3()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to set the emergency level to 3 directly, which requires the approval after this one.","requiredCount":"The number of approvals required to start the timelock."}},"EmergencyAwareContractRegistered(address,address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the registered contract.","registrar":"The address that performed the registration."}},"EmergencyAwareContractRemoved(address,address)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the removed level."}},"EmergencyNotificationProcessed(uint8,address,bool)":{"params":{"contractAddress":"The address of the contract that was notified.","level":"The emergency level that was processed.","success":"A flag indicating if the call to the contract succeeded."}},"EmergencyWithdrawalSet(bool,uint256)":{"params":{"enabled":"True if emergency withdrawal is enabled across the pause."}},"SystemUnpaused(address)":{"params":{"unpauser":"The address that initiated the unpause."}},"TokensRecovered(address,uint256,address)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount recovered.","recipient":"The address that received the recovered tokens.","token":"The address of the recovered token."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"approveLevel3Emergency()":{"details":"Once the required number of approvals is met, a timelock begins. This system uses a proposal ID to ensure approvals are only valid for the current escalation attempt, preventing the use of stale approvals.","returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"cancelLevel3Emergency()":{"details":"This resets all approvals and stops the timelock.","returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"constructor":{"details":"Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable."},"enableEmergencyWithdrawal(bool,uint256)":{"params":{"enabled":"True to enable, false to disable.","penalty":"The penalty to apply during emergency withdrawals, in basis points."},"returns":{"successFlag":"True if the operation was successful."}},"executeLevel3Emergency()":{"details":"Sets the emergency level to Critical, enables emergency withdrawals, and pauses the system.","returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"getApprovalStatus(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"approversLimit":"The maximum number of approver addresses to return.","approversOffset":"The starting index for paginating through the list of approvers."},"returns":{"approversPage":"A paginated list of addresses that have approved.","currentCountOut":"The number of approvals received so far.","executeAfterOut":"The timestamp when the timelock expires.","nextApproverOffset":"The offset for the next page of approvers.","requiredOut":"The number of approvals required.","timelockActiveOut":"True if the timelock is currently active.","totalApprovers":"The total number of approvers."}},"getEmergencyAwareContractsPaginated(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"limit":"The maximum number of addresses to contracts."}},"getEmergencyLevel()":{"returns":{"levelOut":"The current emergency level."}},"getEmergencyWithdrawalSettings()":{"returns":{"enabledOut":"True if emergency withdrawal is Can only be called once.","params":{"accessControlAddress_":"The address of the AccessControl contract.","initialLevel3TimelockDuration_":"The initial timelock duration for a Level 3 emergency.","initialRecoveryAdminAddress_":"The address for receiving recovered tokens.","initialRequiredApprovals_":"The initial number of approvals for a Level 3 emergency.","timelockControllerAddress_":"The address of the EmergencyTimelockController (can be address(0))."}},"isFunctionRestricted(bytes4)":{"params":{"functionSelector":"The 4-byte selector of the function to check."},"returns":{"isRestrictedFlag":"True if the function is currently restricted."}},"isSystemPaused()":{"returns":{"isPausedFlag":"True if the system is paused."}},"pauseSystem()":{"returns":{"successFlag":"True if the operation was successful."}},"processEmergencyForContract(address,uint8)":{"details":"This allows for granular control over emergency responses. It is guarded against being called too frequently for the same contract and level to prevent misuse.","params":{"contractAddr":"The address of the target emergency-aware contract.","level":"The recover.","tokenAddress":"The address of the token to recover."},"returns":{"successFlag":"True if the operation was successful."}},"registerEmergencyAwareContract(address)":{"details":"Aware contracts can be notified of emergency state changes.","params":{"contractAddr":"The address of the contract to register."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"removeEmergencyAwareContract(address)":{"details":"Uses the \"swap and pop\" technique for O(1) gas complexity.","params":{"contractAddr":"The address of the contract to remove."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"setEmergencyLevel(uint8)":{"params":{"level":"The new emergency level (0-3)."},"returns":{"successFlag":"True if the operation was successful."}},"setLevel3TimelockDuration(uint256)":{"params":{"newDuration":"The new timelock duration in :/ipfs/QmQa3DnvccwdWJeWrjgXPnFMTWbzWQWR39hVqC7eEwo2PC"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x0e1f0f5f62f67a881cd1a9597acbc0a5e4071f3c2c10449a183b922ae7272e3f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c25f742ff154998d19a669e2508c3597b363e123ce9144cd0fcf6521229f401f","dweb:/ipfs/QmQXRuFzStEWqeEPbhQU6cAg9PaSowxJVo4PDKyRod7dco"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20PermitUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x07e881de3b9f6d2c07909f193f24b96c7fe4ea60013260f3f25aecd8bab3c2f8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://1fed09b97ccb0ff9ba9b6a94224f1d489026bf6b4b7279bfe64fb6e8749dee4d","dweb:/ipfs/QmcRAzaSP1UnGr4vrGkfJmB2L9aiTYoXfV1Lg9gqrVRWn8"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20Upgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x23b997be73d3dd46885262704f0f8cfc7273fdadfe303d37969a9561373972b5","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://d03ebe5406134f0c4a017dee625ff615031194493bd1e88504e5c8fae55bc166","dweb:/ipfs/QmUZV5bMbgk2PAkV3coouSeSainHN2jhqaQDJaA7hQRyu2"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/utils/AddressUpgradeable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9c80f545915582e63fe206c6ce27cbe85a86fc10b9cd2a0e8c9488fb7c2ee422","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://310136ad60820af4177a11a61d77a3686faf5fca4942b600e08fc940db38396b","dweb:/ipfs/QmbCzMNSTL7Zi7M4UCSqBrkHtp4jjxUnGbkneCZKdR1qeq"]}},"version":1}

approveLevel3Emergency().details: Once the required number of approvals is met, a timelock begins. This system uses a proposal ID to ensure approvals are only valid for the current escalation attempt, preventing the use of stale approvals.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

cancelLevel3Emergency().details: This resets all approvals and stops the timelock.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

params.enabled: True to enable, false to disable.
params.penalty: The penalty to apply during emergency withdrawals, in basis points.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

executeLevel3Emergency().details: Sets the emergency level to Critical, enables emergency withdrawals, and pauses the system.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.approversLimit: The maximum number of approver addresses to return.
params.approversOffset: The starting index for paginating through the list of approvers.

returns.approversPage: A paginated list of addresses that have approved.
returns.currentCountOut: The number of approvals received so far.
returns.executeAfterOut: The timestamp when the timelock expires.
returns.nextApproverOffset: The offset for the next page of approvers.
returns.timelockActiveOut: True if the timelock is currently active.

params.limit: The maximum number of addresses to return.

returns.page: A memory array of contract addresses.
returns.totalContracts: The total number of registered contracts.

returns.enabledOut: True if emergency withdrawal is enabled.

initialize(address,address,uint256,uint2.details: Sets up the initial configuration, including dependent contract addresses and parameters. Can only be called once.

params.accessControlAddress_: The address of the AccessControl contract.
params.initialLevel3TimelockDuration_: The initial timelock duration for a Level 3 emergency.
params.initialRecoveryAdminAddress_: The address for receiving recovered tokens.
params.initialRequiredApprovals_: The initial number of approvals for a Level 3 emergency.
params.timelockControllerAddress_: The address of the EmergencyTimelockController (can be address(0)).

params.functionSelector: The 4-byte selector of the function to check.

returns.isRestrictedFlag: True if the function is currently restricted.

returns.isPausedFlag: True if the system is paused.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

processEmergencyForContract(address,uint.details: This allows for granular control over emergency responses. It is guarded against being called too frequently for the same contract and level to prevent misuse.

params.contractAddr: The address of the target emergency-aware contract.
params.level: The emergency level to pass to the target contract.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to recover.

returns.successFlag: True if the operation was successful.

registerEmergencyAwareContract(address).details: Aware contracts can be notified of emergency state changes.

params.contractAddr: The address of the contract to register.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

removeEmergencyAwareContract(address).details: Uses the "swap and pop" technique for O(1) gas complexity.

params.contractAddr: The address of the contract to remove.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.
True if the operation was successful.

params.newDuration: The new timelock duration in seconds.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.
A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.
A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.
True if the operation was successful.

params.funcSelector: The 4-byte selector of the function to restrict.
params.thresholdVal: The minimum emergency level (1-3) for the restriction to apply. 0 to unrestrict.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

MAX_REQUIRED_APPROVALS().notice: The maximum number of approvals required for a Level 3 emergency escalation.

accessControl().notice: The contract that controls roles and permissions.

approveLevel3Emergency().notice: Submits an approval for escalating to a Level 3 (Critical) emergency.

cancelLevel3Emergency().notice: Cancels an in-progress Level 3 emergency escalation.

currentApprovalCount().notice: The current number of approvals for a Level 3 escalation.

currentApprovers(uint256).notice: A list of addresses that have approved the current Level 3 escalation.

emergencyWithdrawalEnabled().notice: A flag indicating if emergency withdrawal is globally enabled.

emergencyWithdrawalPenalty().notice: The penalty (in BPS) applied to emergency withdrawals.

enableEmergencyWithdrawal(bool,uint256).notice: Enables or disables emergency withdrawal functionality across all integrated contracts.

executeLevel3Emergency().notice: Executes the escalation to a Level 3 emergency after the timelock has passed.

getApprovalStatus(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets the current status of the Level 3 emergency approval process.

getEmergencyAwareContractsPaginated(uint.notice: Retrieves a paginated list of all registered emergency-aware contracts.

getEmergencyLevel().notice: Gets the current system-wide emergency level.

getEmergencyWithdrawalSettings().notice: Gets the current global emergency withdrawal settings.

isFunctionRestricted(bytes4).notice: Checks if a specific function is currently restricted due to the system's emergency level.

isSystemPaused().notice: Checks if the system is currently paused.

level3ApprovalTime().notice: The timestamp when the Level 3 timelock began.

level3TimelockDuration().notice: The duration of the timelock for Level 3 escalation.

level3TimelockInProgress().notice: A flag indicating if a Level 3 escalation timelock is currently active.

pauseSystem().notice: Pauses the entire system, restricting most operations in integrated contracts.

processEmergencyForContract(address,uint.notice: Triggers the `emergencyShutdown` function on a specific registered contract.

recoverTokens(address,uint256).notice: Recovers ERC20 tokens mistakenly sent to the EmergencyController contract.

recoveryAdminAddress().notice: The address authorized to receive tokens recovered via the `recoverTokens` function.

removeEmergencyAwareContract(address).notice: Removes an emergency-aware contract from the registry.

requiredApprovals().notice: The number of unique approvals required to initiate the Level 3 timelock.

restrictedFunctions(bytes4).notice: Maps a function selector to the minimum emergency level at which it becomes restricted.

setLevel3TimelockDuration(uint256).notice: Sets the duration of the timelock for a Level 3 emergency escalation.

setRecoveryAdminAddress(address).notice: Sets the address that will receive tokens recovered from this contract.

setRequiredApprovals(uint256).notice: Sets the number of approvals required to trigger a Level 3 emergency timelock.

systemPaused().notice: A flag indicating if the entire system is globally paused.

timelockController().notice: The timelock controller for scheduling privileged emergency actions (optional).

unpauseSystem().notice: Unpauses the entire system, resuming normal operations.

updateFunctionRestriction(bytes4,uint8).notice: Sets or updates the minimum emergency level at which a function becomes restricted.
